installCommand: if cd .fvm/flutter_sdk 2>/dev/null; then export PATH="$PWD/bin:$PATH" && cd ../..; elif command -v flutter >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Using system Flutter'; else git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1 && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH"; fi && flutter doctor && flutter pub get
